data.value:
Dear [donor],

Thank you for your generous contribution of [amount] to Open Institute on [date] that provides essential funding for the development the open-source mobile app for Open Institute.

Through your generosity, we are able to continue advancing the purpose of Open Institute, as a platform and launchpad serving to create more accountability and transparency in the world of fundraising for non-profit initiatives.

This email is serving as a 501(c)(3) tax-compliant donation receipt, for your records, and declaring that no goods or services were provided by the not-for-profit organization in return for the contribution. EIN (US-tax #): 82-1707895.
